body:

-test.cpu=1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,1 ; do true; done
PASS

Linux localhost 3.4.0 #1 SMP Tue Dec 17 23:25:37 PST 2013 armv7l armv7l armv7l GNU/Linux
